StaticStdpSynapse Class Reference

#include <staticstdpsynapse.h>

Inheritance diagram for StaticStdpSynapse:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A STDP synapse with no synaptic short time dynamics, i.e. no depression and no facilitation.
